extendedInfo.description: "LilyPad HD finally makes it possible to rid yourself of the full-screen chat client on your tablet for something far more practical." â AndroidPolice.comOriginally coining the idea of 'chat heads' back in 2012, LilyPad HD is the first floating instant messaging/chatting app for your Android tablet and phone! Or how about those Samsung popup apps? Yup, LilyPad HD was there before that too. But unlike Facebook's Chat Head (chatheads) messenger, which limits you to only Facebook Messenger, LilyPad HD brings the floating chat/popup app idea to ALL of your favorite instant messaging services. That means you can now watch a YouTube video, surf the internet, or use any of your other apps while simultaneously chatting with your AIM, Yahoo, Jabber, Google Talk/Hangouts, MSN and yes, of course, Facebook friends!With LilyPad HD, you can now have powerful multitasking capabilities just like on your desktop computer. LilyPad HD was designed to 'float' over all of your running applications!. âWhat the press is saying about LilyPad HD!â"Tired of switching between apps to talk to friends while using other apps or surfing the Web on your Android tablet? LilyPad HD solves that problem." - CNET.com"LilyPad HD is the type of tablet application I've been waiting for!" - PhoneDog.comThe free version is limited to only Google Talk and basic features.âWhy should you go Pro?ââ No Ads!Unlocks the following clients:â Google/Hangoutsâ MSNâ Facebook Messengerâ Yahooâ AIMâ Jabber (basic support)As well as other features like:â Make the app transparentâ Increase/decrease message font sizeâ Change font size of your Buddylistâ Quickly search your buddy list for specific contactsâ A better chatheads design with moveable flowing windowsIntuitive Design:-Holo style layout with working action bar-Adjustable/resizable chat windows-Quick Hide Mode: single tap action bar to enable quick hide mode-Double tap action bar to minimize chat windows completely-Tabbed chatting for multiple conversations (perfect for small screens)-Intuitive chat heads design with better support for multiple conversationsIf you have previously purchased LilyPad HD, it automatically unlock the full version of the app upon installation. We cross check the email you used to purchase the original app with our database. Once the system recognizes your email addresses, it unlocks the full version within 15 seconds or less. If you have purchased LilyPad HD and the full version does not automatically unlock, please email your receipt to support@tablifiedapps.com.

reviews.title: Neat idea but the implementation needs work
reviews.comment: Duplicate online buddies, blank online buddies, offline buddies mixed with online buddies... this app needs some work to be truly useful.
reviews.author: Sabrina Anne Howe

reviews.title: Not working with Facebook Group Chats
reviews.comment: Messages from my group chats do not come through and they can not be made through the application. Also, as the app is only really functional through an in app purchase means there is no possibility of a refund. Not pleased at all. Waste of \302\2432.
reviews.author: Henry Lavender

reviews.title: making social movie nights possible
reviews.comment: Me and my girl love having movie nights together. Unfortunately we don\'t live in the same city at the moment. This means we have to rely on chat services to experience a movie together. LillyPad HD\'s transparency and auto minimize settings enables us to be able to chat with each other, having movie dates even though we aren\'t in the same city.
reviews.author: david cassoday

reviews.title: Buggy bugs no fixes!
reviews.comment: EDIT: My facebook contacts appears all buggy 8 out of 10 times I turn on this app I can\'t see my contacts , this app is one of those cases wich is getting worse with time, when i buyed this everything worked well even the thumbnails of contacts were better than this please fix this app for good! Edit2: This app continues to be buggy even after the last update that \"corrected these issues\", updates are very few unfortunately. I sincerely hope that more work is put into this app wich can payoff for sure
reviews.author: Miguel Silva

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: I noticed some graphical glitches and having the options window pop up when I sign in is a little annoying, but otherwise I think the app is fabulous.
reviews.author: Nina Wagner

reviews.title: Combined client
reviews.comment: I like the idea of combining the various chat clients and this makes using my tablet similar to the desktop experience.
reviews.author: Randy Sloan

reviews.title: a good start
reviews.comment: all the pieces are there for a truly amazing app, but a few things could dramatically improve it.    1) more control over what/how things appear in your notifications (if the permanent sticky notification opens the buddy list, why do i need a separate notification for when i minimize it?)   2) themes/control over fonts/sounds/better UI.  i can control the text size for buddies on list and chat windows, but the text of the title header of each window is still huge and dramatically increases amount of screen real estate the window needs. also control over size of buddy icon thumbnail would be good.  in general shrinking the window trim would make this much more functional and slick  3) better way to sort buddy list, for example ability to have \"favorites\" sticky at the top of the list. and/or support for buddy groups in certain services (AIM etc)  otherwise an awesome app.  was using IMO.im previously, it\'s still really awesome and solid, but for a larger tablet screen it is really nice to be able to multitask like this.
reviews.author: John Tyson

reviews.title: Free version useless.
reviews.comment: How am I supposed to evaluate this apps ability to multi-task my social networking chats when I can only put one on screen.  Totally pointless demo.  Perhaps you should consider making an ad supported version do we can try it out with full functionality.
reviews.author: David Gray

reviews.title: Updates?
reviews.comment: I got a prompt response from the developers when I informed them that the program is so buggy that it is unusable...their response was \"we know.\"  Ummmmm.......so when is it going to be fixed.  And if it\'s NOT, then you need to list compatibility issues.  Because this does not even sort of work on my Asus TF700
reviews.author: Mark Campbell

reviews.title: Just started using, very useful
reviews.comment: Just started to use this program and can see all the possibilities.  Haven\'t checked if there is a serious battery hit with the program.  Keep up the good work tablified!
reviews.author: Ian Huey

reviews.title: Promising
reviews.comment: UI is not pretty. Cannot send a message unless receiving one first. Chat window to send does not show who the message is going to. But promising.
reviews.author: Chris Gwartney

reviews.title: One of my favorite apps
reviews.comment: I saw some other people looking for alternatives but this one is simply the best. Decided to get the pro version!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sms please!
reviews.comment: Please add sms function as soon as possible. I really need it!
reviews.author: Arya Putra

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Very useful on tablet.
reviews.author: Son Pham

reviews.title: Crashes Every time
reviews.comment: Nice app if it didn\'t crash
reviews.author: Bill Hamilton

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Great way to take advantage of Android\'s multitasking! Can\'t wait til text are incorporated.
reviews.author: Kristopher Salmon

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Perfect on my tablet....get this!
reviews.author: chaniel mays

reviews.title: Excellent ...
reviews.comment: The apps uses a cutting edge technology in messaging with a sleeky popup window... love to see more themes and updates.....
reviews.author: Mahadeer Mohamed

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Nice for having access to all your messages highly recommend.
reviews.author: alex stewart

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This makes my tablet feel more like a computer. Works perfectly with Facebook chat.
reviews.author: Thejus Kayanadath
